ABa.caption: HTML
ABa.default_val: {                 "personalizations":                      [{"to": to,                      "cc": cc,                      "bcc": bcc,                     "subject": properties.subject}],                  "from": {"email": properties.fromEmail,                          "name": properties.fromName},                  "reply_to": {"email": properties.replyTo,                              "name": properties.replyToName},                  "content":[{                            "type": "text/html",                      "value": htmlString                      }],                 "attachments": attachments             }
ABa.doc: The JSON body that will be sent to SendGrid's Send v3 API endpoint
ABa.name: html

ACu.caption: As this is a legacy flow for Canvas apps created before this plugin existed, this flow is not updated to work with Postmark. Contact support@airdev.co if this is a feature your app would use.
ACu.name: info
